name: 1 gear 2 GRIND
description:
1 Gear 2 Grind is a "Non-Endless_Runner" with a single button control scheme.

The "Grinder is coming!....You must escape!

Luckily, you found a vehicle.....it has only one gear though....

Reach the "Space Portal" to escape the "Grinder"!

At least you have  that 1Gear2Grind! 

Made for the GMTK Game-Jam 2019
